argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srngcnv.i | |- .* = ( *rf ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srngf1o.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_srngrhm | |- ( R e. *Ring -> .* e. ( R RingHom ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( oppR ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_rhmf | |- ( .* e. ( R RingHom ( oppR ` R ) ) -> .* : B --> ( Base ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( .* : B --> ( Base ` ( oppR ` R ) ) -> .* Fn B ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. *Ring -> .* Fn B ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_srngcnv | |- ( R e. *Ring -> .* = `' .* ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( R e. *Ring -> ( .* Fn B <-> `' .* Fn B ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_mpbid | |- ( R e. *Ring -> `' .* Fn B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_dff1o4 | |- ( .* : B -1-1-onto-> B <-> ( .* Fn B /\ `' .* Fn B ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. *Ring -> .* : B -1-1-onto-> B ) |
